# Insurance â€“ Regulatory Constraints

## Mandatory Constraints
- Policy and claim records must meet regulatory retention requirements.
- Consumer protection rules must be enforced.
- Disclosure and transparency obligations must be satisfied.

## Compliance Expectations
- Deterministic eligibility evaluation
- Explicit communication of outcomes
- Complete audit trail for policies and claims

## Forbidden
- Non-reproducible claim decisions
- Undocumented policy adjustments
- Inconsistent regulatory reporting
